010package imagingbook.common.mser;
011
012import static imagingbook.common.color.sets.ColorEnumeration.getColors;
013
014import java.awt.Color;
015
016import imagingbook.common.color.sets.ColorEnumeration;
017
018/**
019 * Color definitions used in MSER demo plugins.
020 * 
021 * @author WB
022 * @version 2022/11/19
023 */
024public enum MserColors implements ColorEnumeration {
025        Red(240, 0, 0),
026        Green(0, 185, 15),
027        Blue(0, 60, 255),
028        Magenta(255, 0, 200),
029        Brown(160, 82, 45),
030        Yellow(255, 200, 0),
031        Orange(255, 182, 86),
032        Cyan(0, 198, 255),
033        ;
034
035        public static final Color[] LevelColors = 
036                        getColors(Red, Green, Blue, Magenta);
037
038        
039        private final Color color;
040        
041        MserColors(int r, int g, int b) {
042                this.color = new Color(r, g, b);
043        }
044        
045        @Override
046        public Color getColor() {
047                return this.color;
048        }
049
050}
